column4: i was wondering if anyone can help me with an "Operating System not found" error..  i have a hammerhead XRT tablet computer, 1 usb 1 ethernet, 1x 40gig hitchi travelstar harddrive 2.5" i installed ubuntu 8.04 onto it using a computer that had a cdrom drive.. but it will not boot from the disk once i put it into the hammerhead
on my acer I have to flag the partition sda1 as bootable and install grub there, not on sda
i can't even get it to read from the hdd..
i was wondering if there may be a guide
how do you know that it doesn't read from HD?
because the same thing happens if i take the hdd out of the tablet
no no.. i just got this thing off ebay.. no os pre-installed
make a bootable usb pen with ubuntu _live_ on that
and then try to boot from first hard disk
or else fiddle with the bios :)
is there a guide on how to do that? i was considering that
pretty handy to have ubuntu always with you :)
